channel.title: Need help with my 317 asap please
channel.description:
ok well i have a 317 it has soul split and turmoil. i has no dragon claws. its project insanity base. i either want to add dragon claws to the client im using or something i have a 317/508 client i downloaded it it loads my guy in for a second then kicks it right back off. getting back into the coding stuff. dont really know what needs to be done to make this work. could someone please help. someone can teamview me and do it or tell me on this or msn/aim. please help
thanks

item.title: Need help with my 317 asap please
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok well first i cant help you 100% i can get you on the right track tho.

this will be more a client problem than a server problem.

your server is coded to accept only connections from the client its assigned. this will stop lots of cheat clients.

now to change this im not sure but it will take coding in both client and server.

try to search:

  • how to make server accept other clients

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my 317 asap please
